content:
I'm glad you're considering "Brew-tiful Day" again! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have real-time information about the current time, your location, or the bus schedule. I can provide general guidance, but you'll need to check the specifics to ensure you make your bus on time.

To determine if you can get a coffee and make it to the bus stop on time, you might want to consider the following:

1. **Check the time**: Look at the current time and calculate how long it'll take you to get to "Brew-tiful Day" and grab a coffee.
2. **Check the bus schedule**: Verify the bus schedule to see when the next bus is arriving at your stop.
3. **Estimate travel time**: Calculate how long it'll take you to get from "Brew-tiful Day" to the bus stop.

If you have enough time to grab a coffee and make it to the bus stop before the bus arrives, you should be good to go! If not, you might need to adjust your plan or consider a quicker coffee option.

Remember to leave some buffer time for unexpected delays, and don't forget to check for any road closures or construction that might affect your journey.

I hope this helps, and you make it to the bus stop on time with your coffee in hand!
